properties.areaDesc: Lafayette, MS; Marshall, MS; Union, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:47AM CST until February 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Coldwater River...Little
Tallahatchie Canal.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany
* until Thursday February 13.
* At 10 AM Tuesday the stage was 25.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 26.5 feet on Wednesday February 12.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Tuesday February 11 and will
continue rising to near 26.5 feet by Wednesday February 12. The
river will fall below flood stage Thursday February 13.
* At 26.0 feet...County Highway 47 near Mud Creek and Mill Creek has
6 to 12 inches of water over it. Several thousand acres of crop
land are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
